author: olegk
msg: Removed synchronization on the connection state. Synchronization by the i/o reactor should be sufficient

author: robbie
msg: QPID-3855: only increment activeConsumerCount during registration if the subscription is active. Add unit test to identify the issue and check behaviour following various state change notifications.
